Rapporten er gemt.

Detaljer: {e}
da.excel_unexpected_error_message:
En uventet fejl opstod under lagring.

Detaljer: {e}
da.about_purpose_text:
PDFRecon identificerer potentielt manipulerede PDF-filer ved at:
• Udtrække og analysere XMP-metadata, streams og revisioner
• Detektere tegn på ændringer (f.eks. /TouchUp_TextEdit, /Prev)
• Udtrække komplette, tidligere versioner af dokumentet
• Generere en overskuelig rapport i Excel-format
da.about_included_software_text:
Dette værktøj benytter og inkluderer {tool} af Phil Harvey.
{tool} er distribueret under Artistic/GPL-licens.

da.timeline_no_data: Der blev ikke fundet tidsstempeldata for denne fil.

en.status_initial: Drag a folder here, open a case, or use the button to start an analysis.
en.status_initial_reader: Use File -> Open Case... to view a saved analysis.
en.scan_complete_summary: ✔ Finished: {total} Documents | Total {total_altered} altered | {changed_count} files with {revs} revisions | {indications_found_count} with indications | {clean} not detected
en.scan_complete_summary_with_errors: ✔ Finished: {total} Documents | Total {total_altered} altered | {changed_count} files with {revs} revisions | {indications_found_count} with indications | {clean} not detected | {errors} errors
en.no_exif_output_message: There is either no EXIFTool output for this file, or an error occurred during execution.
en.no_indicators_message: No indicators found for this file.

The license file 'license.txt' could not be found.

Please ensure the file is named 'license.txt' and is included correctly when packaging the application.

Details: {e}
en.excel_unexpected_error_message:
An unexpected error occurred during saving.

Details: {e}
en.open_folder_error_message: Could not automatically open the folder.
en.about_purpose_text:
PDFRecon identifies potentially manipulated PDF files by:
• Extracting and analyzing XMP metadata, streams, and revisions
• Detecting signs of alteration (e.g., /TouchUp_TextEdit, /Prev)
• Extracting complete, previous versions of the document
• Generating a clear report in Excel format
en.about_included_software_text:
This tool utilizes and includes {tool} by Phil Harvey.
{tool} is distributed under the Artistic/GPL license.
